name: Spirulina News
author: MS

sections.description:
Let you add a customizeable widget to display the news from http://www.spirulina-handel.de/blog/ in your sidebar.

Features: – widgeht is customizeable – you can define how much postings are displayed – you can short the title
sections.installation:
1. Extract spirulina-news.zip.
  2. Upload the folder spirulina-news to the /wp-content/plugins/ path.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Adminpanel.
  4. Add the widget to your sidebar from Appearance -> Widgets and configure the widget options.

short_description: Let you add a customizeable widget to display the news from http://www.spirulina-handel.de/blog/ in your sidebar.
